original_text:
The pride of your heart has deceived you,
    you who live in the clefts of the rocks
    and make your home on the heights,
you who say to yourself,
    ‘Who can bring me down to the ground?’
korean_text: 너의 마음의 교만이 너를 속였도다 바위 틈에 거주하며 높은 곳에 사는 자여 네가 마음에 이르기를 누가 능히 나를 땅에 끌어내리겠느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: The pride of your heart has deceived you
you who live in the clefts of the rocks
and make your home on the heights
sentences.korean_translation: 높은 곳에 네 거처를 두는 자로다

sentences.original_text: Who can bring me down to the ground?
